title: Change starts today
excerpt: John Maxwell says in  Today Matters : “The greatest of all miracles is that we need not be tomorrow what we are today, the greatest of all insights is that we cannot be tomorrow what we do not do toda

children.text: : “The greatest of all miracles is that we need not be tomorrow what we are today, the greatest of all insights is that we cannot be tomorrow what we do not do today. That is why,
If nothing makes today any different from any other day, why would you expect tomorrow to be any different?
